category.name: Configurator Services
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0_GetValidValues_Service_Batch_Size
preference.preference_description: Specifies the target size of a GetValidValues request that should not be undershot unless the task is smaller than these many values to validate. Teamcenter will fill up requests according to the target request size. When it makes sense the task will be broken up into multiple requests each having the target size. These requests can be processed in parallel according to preference Cfg0_Service_Connections_Count.
